data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Instead of a job for life, it's now generally accepted we will have a portfolio of careers — a series of roles and three to four different career paths. As people live longer, mature age is redefined, and people are increasingly changing careers at any age. Older adults who are looking at middle age, often find themselves facing a different set of responsibilities and personal needs. Whether they have kids that they are caring for, their own aging parents who need help, or they are simply so settled into their familiar work routine that they are craving new challenges and ways to contribute to the world, many older workers are in a time of shifting focus and increased responsibilities. That being said, the need for flexibility and new passion constitute the two biggest motives for a middle-aged person to change to a completely different career. (147字)
data.referenceText: What might motivate a middle-aged person to change to a completely different career?
data.referenceTranslate: 是什么促使中年人改行从事完全不同的职业?
